name: Phenom
description:
An unexpected outbreak of a mysterious virus that turns people into crazed zombies has forced James and his wife Alice to leave town. Along the way, they had an accident, and James woke up and realized that his wife had disappeared and now he would have to find her before it was too late...

You will have to survive in a zombie apocalypse with moving around the grid using improvised means, environment and logic. Don't get caught by the enemy, but don't forget that they can hear loud noises.

Weapons, ammo and other important items can be used against zombies, but do it wisely because if they pounce, you are doomed...
